data.text: “Donge dhano nigi tich matek e piny?
Mana kaka misumba ma gombo ni seche mag odhiambo ochop piyo,
e kaka an bende osemiya dweche maonge ohala
Ka adhi nindo to piny ok runa piyo kendo aparora ni abiro aa malo sa adi?
Denda kute gi adhonde opongʼo,
“Ndalo mar ngimana dhiyo mapiyo moloyo masind jachwe usi,
Yaye Nyasaye, parie kaka ngimana en mana muya nono;
Wenge makoro nena sani ok nochak onena kendo,
Mana kaka bor polo rumo mi lal nono,
Ok nodwogi e ode kendo;
“Emomiyo ok anyal lingʼ;
An nam, koso an ondiek nam
Ka aparo ni kitandana biro hoya
to eka pod ibwoga gi lek magalagala
momiyo koro daher mondo adera kendo atho,
Achayo ngimana; ok agomb kata medo bedo mangima.
“Yaye Nyasaye, dhano to en angʼo
koso angʼo momiyo isiko inone okinyi kokinyi
Yaye Nyasaye, bende diweye ngʼiya,
Yaye jarang ji-ni, kata bed ni asetimo richo,
Angʼo momiyo idagi ngʼwonona kuom ketho maga
